Annual meeting of Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee held
articles.content:
Annual meeting of Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee held 
    Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee was held in Pyongyang on Thursday.
 Present at the meeting were Minister of Education Pyon Yong Rip who is chairman of the solidarity committee, officials concerned and members of the committee.    
 On hand were Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Esteban Lobaina Romero and staff members of the embassy. 
 The meeting reviewed last year's work of the committee for friendship and solidarity with the Cuban people vigorously advancing along the road of independence against imperialism and the road of socialism and discussed an action program this year.

Congratulatory message to Armenian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory message to Armenian President 
    Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on March 11 sent a congratulatory message to Robert Kocharyan on his reelection as President of Armenia.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the peace and stability of the country and the well-being of its people.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cyprian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cyprian Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to George Iacovou on his appointment as Foreign Minister of Cyprus.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms and sincerely wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Federal Chancellor of Austria
articles.content:
Congratulations to Federal Chancellor of Austria
    Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Wolfgang Schuessel upon his reelection as Federal Chancellor of Austria.
 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger and develop.    
 Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Benita Ferrero Waldner upon his reappointment as Federal Foreign Minister of Austria.
